entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 12:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
